name: The Happies - Amber Falcon
description:
In Happies: Amber Falcon, a 2d hand-painted side-scrolling game, you take control of Happies, eternally happy little people who are about to explore the new and dangerous world in a hot air balloon. But your happiness will be challenged by a disaster of cosmic proportions.

On board the Amber Falcon, you were forced to evacuate your planet and face the dangers of an unknown world after a mysterious crash landing. You will avoid obstacles and traps while collecting "enerbees" - alien fireflies that power up your balloon.

Explore unknown locations and ancient artifacts. Collect resources to repair your ship in 10 story missions and countless free levels that take you across many diverse environments.

The Happies is suitable for beginners and children as well as experienced players. It offers 3 different difficulties for everyone to enjoy.

Key features

  • 15 playable characters
  • 15+ unlockable balloons
  • 10+ unlockable baskets
  • 10 story levels
  • 10+ free levels
  • hand painted art style
  • 30 unlockable archievements
  • 3 difficulties
